name: Tochi II: Senshi
description:
Tochi II: Senshi is an Action-Adventure game made exclusively for the Playdate and is releasing on July 3, 2022.

Tochi II: Senshi is set in an abandoned settlement filled with traps that was once home to The Knights of Senshi!

Explore the Senshi settlement with your mysterious companion Amori! But be carful of the monsters that will strike you down the moment they see you! And if you die it's game over!

D-pad = Movements

A  Button = Attack

B  Button = Amori's Vision

There are multiple ways to sideload Tochi II: Senshi onto your Playdate!

Panic's official instructions on how to do so can be founded right here!
